data.name: ANZ Business Loan
data.description:
With a choice of repayment options, our Business Loan lets you handpick the solutions that suit your business best

Campaign offer 6.59%* (secured) variable rate loan. Valid until 31/07/23. *Business Mortgage Index minus special offer. Rate correct as at 16/06/2023. For further details and eligibility criteria refer to https://www.anz.com.au/business/loans-finance/business-loan/

fees.name: Certificate of Balance Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable on request of a Certificate of Balance

fees.name: Certificate of Interest Paid Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable on request of a Certificate of Interest Paid

fees.name: Document Preparation Fee - Loan Securities
fees.additionalInfo: For preparation of Mortgage over Property, Charge over Asset, Corporate Guarantee or Individual Guarantee. The fee applies to each document prepared. Where two Mortgage over Property documents are prepared the total document preparation fee is $400.

fees.name: Late Payment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Amount becomes immediately payable when amount payment due remains unpaid for 30 or more days. The fee will be payable each month the amount remains unpaid.

fees.name: Lodgement Fee - Original Registration
fees.additionalInfo: Original registration by ANZ

fees.name: Lodgement Fee - Registration
fees.additionalInfo: Charge for lodgement for registration of ANZ Mortgages, Discharges of Mortgage, Transfers of Land, PPS interests, assignment or reassignment of Life Policies and other documents

fees.name: Lodgement Fee - Re-registration
fees.additionalInfo: Re-registration of Personal Property Security Interests

fees.name: PPSR Registration, Renewal and Amendment Fees
fees.additionalInfo: Fees are determined by the Australian Financial Security Authority, not ANZ. Currently, on renewal of securities on PPSR: $6 for 7 year PPSR renewal or $25 for 25 year renewal.

fees.name: Preparation/Execution Fee - Discharge of Mortgage
fees.additionalInfo: Preparation and/or execution of Discharge of Mortgage

fees.name: Preparation/Execution Fee - Consent to Lease/Deed of Priority
fees.additionalInfo: Preparation and/or execution of Consent to Lease or Deed of Priority

fees.name: Production Fee
fees.additionalInfo: For any changes that occur to a registered mortgage or on request for a certificate of title or other security document

fees.name: Redraw Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when funds are redrawn from the loan. Noted in applicable letters of offer only

fees.name: Search Fee
fees.additionalInfo: For searching for additional information (beyond normal searches like title search) required to obtain information from a government or regulatory body regarding the loan. Charged per property security.

fees.name: Settlement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when there is a security to be provided or varied under an ANZ loan. It is charged per settlement attended even if it falls through and even if physical settlement doesn’t occur.

fees.name: Statement of Amount Owing
fees.additionalInfo: Payable where a statement of amount owing on a loan account is supplied on your request more frequently than one in any three month period. $17.50 per 15 minutes.

fees.name: Supplying Certificates
fees.additionalInfo: For supplying a certificate(s) for audit or other purposes. $70 per hour, with a minimum of $50.

fees.name: Enforcement Expenses
fees.additionalInfo: Non-payment that is referred to a third party debt collection agency. The amount charged depends upon the enforcement action taken and the agency to which the debt is referred.

fees.name: Stamp Duty - Mortgage Document
fees.additionalInfo: Payable where stamp duty is applicable to the loan at the time of settlement. The amount is calculated by the state or territory government's administrative body (e.g. Titles Office) using the value of the property being purchased.

fees.name: Stamp Duty - Transfer Land
fees.additionalInfo: Payable where stamp duty is applicable to the loan at the time of settlement. The amount is calculated by the state or territory government's administrative body (e.g. Titles Office) using the value of the property being purchased.

fees.name: Early Repayment Cost
fees.additionalInfo: For full or partial early repayment of the loan

fees.name: Renewal of a Fixed Rate Term
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is charged at the time a fixed rate loan is renewed for a further fixed rate term and the ability to renew a further fixed rate term was not incorporated into the current Letter of Offer.

fees.name: Forward Start Fee
fees.additionalInfo: For guaranteeing a fixed rate on a loan that will be drawn on a specific drawdown date up to 60 days from the date of fee payment. Fee amount is Priced on Application

fees.name: Loan Administration Charge
fees.additionalInfo: Charged in arrears for administration of the account. Price on application

fees.name: Loan Approval Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for any approved application for a new loan/facility or a change to the terms of an existing loan/facility.  Fee is subject to negotiation and will be detailed on your Letter of Offer

fees.name: Locked Rate Fee
fees.additionalInfo: $600 + 0.15% of the loan amount. Payable before or on the first drawdown date of a loan to lock in the interest rate current at the time of application for a loan which is to be drawn down at an approved drawdown date in the future. Only available for loans up to $500,000 with a fixed term between 1 and 5 years.

eligibility.additionalInfo: You must be 18 years of age or older to apply

features.additionalInfo: Access using ANZ Internet Banking or ANZ App
Conditions and costs apply for early repayments on fixed rate products
